1506710.name: Nemesis - RPG
1506710.description:
Step Into the World of Nemesis

An epic journey awaits!
Dive into the story of Artrium, a naive young boy living peacefully in the village of Wil Helm… until that fateful night. Artrium awakens in a strange city engulfed in flames. A merciless monster is slaughtering everyone in sight! Lost and terrified, Artrium must find his way home… but at what cost?

A 90’s RPG Comeback

A love letter to the classics, with a modern twist.
Do you miss the iconic RPGs of the 90s? Nemesis is here for you. Immerse yourself in a rich, captivating world that will keep you hooked for dozens of hours. And if you’re a seasoned adventurer, take on the challenge of "Expert Mode"… but beware: only the bold will survive!

A World Where Every Choice Matters

  • Innovative Crafting System: Gather resources from fallen enemies and craft gear tailored to your needs. The world is full of dangers, and without the right equipment, survival is impossible.

  • Beware the Night...: Time waits for no one. Travel after dark, and night spirits may invade your battles. Face them bravely, and you’ll earn rare and essential rewards.

  • Master the Elements: Each enemy has unique resistances and weaknesses. Experiment with elemental combinations to trigger unexpected effects and turn the tide of battle!

Unique, Strategic Classes

In Nemesis, choose from a variety of classes to match your playstyle:

  • Fighter: A balanced warrior who excels at switching between offensive and defensive stances.

  • Inflictor: A sorcerer who manipulates elemental synergies, capable of unleashing unpredictable storms.

  • Cleric: The heart of your team. This healer brings much-needed relief to the chaos of battle.

  • Mystic: A risky blend of power and fragility. The Mystic builds up states of trance that can collapse with a single mistake.

  • Spellblade: A master of the elements, equally skilled in offense and defense, sharing elemental affinities with allies.

  • Bard: A powerful support role, amplifying your team with potent buffs—though they cannot benefit themselves.

  • Mystery Class: Explore every corner of the world of Nemesis to uncover this hidden class!

Ready to Take the Challenge?

Immerse yourself in Nemesis, a game that will leave its mark on you with its captivating atmosphere and challenging mechanics. The fate of Artrium—and perhaps the entire world—rests in your hands.
